name: Attack on Titan Fan Game (Vlaque)
description:
You control a Scout in this first-person experience. Take flight with the Omnidirectional Mobility Gear and save humanity!

Fly through a large sandbox environment or hone your skills in a selection of time trials.

Future updates will include:

Combat

Multiplayer

and more...

This is a fan-made work in progress. This is not an official product licensed by the Attack on Titan copyright holders.

Discord : https://discord.gg/VxTNqVZHsP

Twitter :

PC Optimized Graphics

Enjoy a range of graphics quality options designed to fit any device, unlocked IPS, and support for other technologies including NVIDIA DLSS 2 and NVIDIA DLSS 3 for accelerated graphics performance, NVIDIA DLAA for improved image quality, and NVIDIA Reflex for reduced latency. Also supports AMD FSR 2.1, Intel XeSS and IGTI scaling technologies.
